# cronologia

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `cronologia` is to create an interactive time line widget in RMarkdown documents and Shiny applications. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of `cronologia` from Github with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}

remotes::install_github("feddelegrand7/cronologia")

```



## Code of Conduct
